name: claude-memory-plugin
description: Claude Code plugin for memory skill system - persistent knowledge storage with semantic search, contextual gotcha injection, and graph-based knowledge management

scripts.test: bun run test:clean && bun run test:isolated
scripts.test:clean: bun test skills/memory/src/ hooks/src/core/ hooks/src/services/semantic-search.spec.ts hooks/src/utils/ hooks/src/memory/directory-protection.spec.ts hooks/src/memory/pattern-matcher.spec.ts hooks/src/memory/relevance-scorer.spec.ts hooks/src/memory/topic-classifier.spec.ts hooks/src/session/session-cache.spec.ts hooks/src/session/session-state.spec.ts tests/integration/
scripts.test:isolated: bunx vitest run hooks/src/memory/gotcha-injector.spec.ts hooks/src/session/extract-context.spec.ts hooks/src/services/ollama.spec.ts && bun test hooks/src/session/fork-detection.spec.ts && bun test hooks/src/session/spawn-session.spec.ts
scripts.test:coverage: bun run test:clean --coverage && bunx vitest run hooks/src/memory/gotcha-injector.spec.ts hooks/src/session/extract-context.spec.ts hooks/src/services/ollama.spec.ts && bun test hooks/src/session/fork-detection.spec.ts && bun test hooks/src/session/spawn-session.spec.ts
